text: Asteropeia amblyocarpa is a species of plant in the Asteropeiaceae family. It is endemic to Madagascar. Its natural habitats are subtropical or tropical dry forests and rural gardens. It is threatened by habitat loss. It is included in several national parks. ==References== Category:Flora of Madagascar amblyocarpa Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Asteropeia amblyocarpa
